author: dkulp
msg: * Change top level pom to be "release" by default.   You now need -Psnapshots to run snapshot things like cobertura.   This will speed up builds as it won't hit the snapshot servers unless you ask it to.
* Update usage of DOMImplementationRegistry to do the Sun hack only if needed, not all the time.  (IBM's JDK doesn't need it and the hack breaks it there)

author: ericjohnson
msg: Update to fix some typos. Thanks Peter!!
